Detailed Description

This class is the core of the Watcher.

It is responsible for receiving watcher requests and sending replies.

int WatcherNub::handleInputNotification ( int  fd  )  [virtual]

This method is called by Mercury when there is data to read on the watcher socket.

It calls the receiveRequest method to actually process the request.

Implements Mercury::InputNotificationHandler.

int WatcherNub::registerWatcher ( int  id,
const char *  abrv,
const char *  longName,
const char *  listeningInterface = NULL,
uint16  listeningPort = 0 
)

This method broadcasts a watcher register message for this watcher.

Parameters:
id Numeric id for this watcher.
abrv Short name for this watcher.
longName Long name for this watcher.
listeningInterface The name of the network interface to listen on.
listeningPort The port to listen on.

This method sends the handler to receive events for this watcher.

wrh The WatcherRequestHandler object to receive events.
